Question: Barkan Mounting Systems CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Barkan Mounting Systems

TV Mounts

 - Fall Proof system to prevent screen disengagement
 - Patented mechanism for various screen types
 - VESA standard compatibility

Tablet Mount Holder

 - Lockable, anti-theft design
 - Full motion articulating with 360-degree rotation
 - Suits 7 - 14 inch devices, including Apple iPad

Ceiling TV Mount

 - Compatibility: 75x75 to 600x400mm
 - Max Load: 95lbs/43kg
 - 10 optional height levels
 - Minimum ceiling distance: 17"/43cm

Full Motion TV Wall Mount

 - For Flat/Curved TVs 29" - 65"
 - Compatibility: 75x75 to 200x200mm
 - Max Load: 88lbs/40kg
 - Distance from wall: 1.2"/3cm
